subject: Fashion
title: Jaden Smith in a Skirt
description: One-minute skill: Jaden Smith in a Skirt.

hook.text: In 2016, Jaden Smith appeared in a Louis Vuitton womenswear campaign wearing a skirt.

buildup.text: He'd worn skirts and dresses beforeâ€”to school, to events, on Instagram. He didn't explain.

discovery.text: Louis Vuitton didn't cast him despite the skirt. They cast him because of it.

twist.text: Social media exploded with debate. But Gen Z overwhelmingly supported him.

climax.text: A luxury brand betting on a boy in a skirt signaled that fashion's gender wall was cracking.

punchline.text: He wore a skirt. Fashion caught up.

quiz.question: Why was Jaden Smith's Louis Vuitton campaign significant?
options: It was the first time a male celebrity endorsed a fashion brand
It launched a new unisex clothing line that outsold all competitors
A luxury brand featured a young man in womenswear as a deliberate casting choice
